General_Description: '''Lawless Hearts''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the Portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Description: On a [[message board]], Kassandra found a note about a contract: "[[Bandit]]s pose a threat to people in the area." – Leader of (region)
Section_Outcome: Kassandra killed a number of bandits in the region, gaining rewards for doing this.
Section_Behind_the_scenes: This very same contract appears also under the names [[The Bandits of Misfortune]], [[Poisonous Land]], and [[Remove the Vermin]].
